HMI_Button.MainDesc: This element includes 2 functions both are executed, when the button is pressed: 1. Included elements are executed once after a click, 2. If the sequences is staying in the Teststep it performs a step to the Teststep given in the „TeststepName“ attribute (link to the name of the Teststep)
HMI_Button.TestStepName: Name of the Teststep the Button will step to. Easiest is to link it to the Name-attribute of that Teststep.
HMI_Button.Goto_OnOff: Turn the Goto-Functionality on and off
HMI_Button.GoSub: If selected the program-flow will return to the Teststep with the HMI_BUtton inside
